ch0112_90_hibiki/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I knew it was
about time you’d show!
ch0112_90_hibiki/0101_0701_02_10: We’re gonna battle till we drop today!
ch0112_90_hibiki/7101_0701_01_10:
I’m so glad I have the power of an arc suit.
Just like Lance and the others!
ch0112_90_hibiki/7101_0701_02_10: But Silver also awakened his arc suit...
ch0112_90_hibiki/7101_0701_03_10:
so if I wanna beat my rival, I can’t get
comfortable!
ch0112_90_hibiki/7102_0701_01_10:
My Lugia is really stoic, but it has its
carefree moments!
ch0112_90_hibiki/7102_0701_02_10:
Whenever it’s battling or flying through the
sky, it looks like it’s having so much fun!
ch0112_90_hibiki/7102_0701_03_10:
Well...at least as far as I can tell.
The change is pretty subtle.
ch0112_90_hibiki/7103_0701_01_10:
Now that Lugia and I have awakened this
arc suit, I feel like we can do anything!
ch0112_90_hibiki/7103_0701_02_10:
I wanna be a true Pokéathlete and compete
in Johto Pokéathlons.
ch0112_90_hibiki/7103_0701_03_10:
Can you imagine them putting up a statue of
me and Lugia? It could happen!
ch0112_90_hibiki/7104_0701_01_10:
I wanna be strong and coolheaded,
like Lugia.
ch0112_90_hibiki/7104_0701_02_10:
It’s cool when someone’s super quiet but
then super strong when they mean business.
ch0112_90_hibiki/7104_0701_03_10: Oh, wait! Is THAT why Lugia’s so aloof?
ch0112_90_hibiki/7105_0701_01_10:
Arc suits are super powerful, but I don’t
think that should limit us!
ch0112_90_hibiki/7105_0701_02_10: We’ll keep on strengthening our bonds!
ch0112_90_hibiki/7105_0701_03_10:
And let’s get stronger by battling more, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0112_90_hibiki/1701_0701_01_10: Great timing! Here, this is for you!
ch0112_90_hibiki/2501_0701_01_10:
The Sinjoh Ruins are a mysterious place said
to have a deep connection to Arceus.
ch0112_90_hibiki/2501_0701_02_10:
Apparently, they were created by people
who moved from Sinnoh to Johto. I wonder
how long ago that was.
ch0112_90_hibiki/2501_0702_01_10:
Johto has lots of old structures, such as the
Ruins of Alph and the Bell Tower.
ch0112_90_hibiki/2501_0702_02_10:
I bet history buffs like Cynthia can’t get
enough of them!
ch0112_90_hibiki/2501_0702_03_10:
If you’re interested in history, you should
visit! I’ll show you around!
ch0112_90_hibiki/2511_0701_01_10: People say Arceus created the world.
ch0112_90_hibiki/2511_0701_02_10:
Can you imagine having the power to create
an entire world? I sure can’t.
ch0112_90_hibiki/2511_0702_01_10: If I ever meet Arceus, I should thank it.
ch0112_90_hibiki/2511_0702_02_10:
If Arceus hadn’t created the world, you and I
never would’ve met!
ch0112_90_hibiki/2511_0702_03_10: We owe it for such a cool world!
ch0112_90_hibiki/3001_0701_01_10:
Rise and shine! Lugia and I went flying over
the sea this morning! I feel so refreshed!
ch0112_90_hibiki/3003_0701_01_10:
You should try talking to your Pokémon! I bet
you’ll find out so many things about them!
ch0112_90_hibiki/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s getting dark outside! Let’s go to bed
early tonight so we’re ready for tomorrow’s
adventures!
